items.title: Definition List
items.text: A number of connected items or names written or printed consecutively, typically one below the other.

items.title: This is a term.
items.text: This is the definition of that term, which both live in a dl.

items.title: Here is another term.
items.text: And it gets a definition too, which is this line.

items.title: Here is term that shares a definition with the term below.
items.text: And it gets a definition too, which is this line.
